Bacon Wrapped Dates

side

Ingredients

For the glaze

  • Balsamic vinegar
  • Honey

For the dates

  • Medjool Dates
  • Thinly sliced bacon (about half a slice of bacon per date)
  • Toothpicks

Procedure

Make the glaze

  1. combine about equal parts honey and balsamic vinegar in a bowl and mix to combine

Make the dates

  1. Preheat oven to 375
  2. Wash and remove pits from dates (if not already pitted)
  3. Wrap date in bacon - Start from one end and roll the date. Once the bacon just overlaps itself, trim the bacon.
  4. Stick a toothpick through the date to hold the bacon in place
  5. Line a sheet pan with foil and place a oven safe cooling rack on top. Arrange dates on cooling rack and bake for 20-30 minutes (depending on bacon thickness). About halfway through, brush with glaze
  6. Remove from oven when bacon is nice and crispy!
